originalText.text: My child and I absolutely love the staff and center. They have been able to accommodate us and make us feel extremely comfortable. Daycare is new for the both of us, and the fact that we are 2 weeks in and he no longer cries but waves me goodbye is amazing. They treat him as if he were their own and throughout the day they provide me with constant updates on all activities. The center is very well maintained / clean as well !
